content.text:
# Draft:Tips To Quit Smoking

Tips To Quit Smoking
1# Cut down on cigarette spending and smoke less
2# Seek support from family members or go to a therapist that could help you
3# Set a smoke date marioncountyhealthdept.org says more "This is a very important step. Pick a specific day within the next month as your “Quit Day.” Picking a date too far in the future allows you time to rationalize and change your mind. But do give yourself enough time to prepare and come up with a plan. You might choose a date with a special meaning like a birthday or anniversary, or the date of the Great American Smokeout (the third Thursday in November each year)."
